name: The Murder Before Christmas
description:
It was such a fun office Christmas party until the knife for the cake went missing... and everyone found it stuck in the back of your now-deceased boss, Vic Timm. Solve the mystery of who killed the victim in this narrative-driven whodunnit!

The game is currently a demo. Please expect a full game soon!

How to Play

Hold the mouse button down on the text box to speed up the text or to proceed to the next line.

Content and Art Warnings
  • Blood
  • Red and green colored art
    (will have an update for colorblindness in the near future)
  • Unabashedly too Christmas that even I am surprised I leaned so heavily into it
